Annotation.String: This is the schema definition for the CRAC Metrics.
This resource shall be used to represent a cooling metrics resource for a Redfish implementation.
Cooling properties can be updated to change limits, exceptions and other writable properties.
The actual Firmware Revision of CRAC.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Firmware Rev of CRAC.
The actual Hardware Revision of CRAC.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Hardware Rev of CRAC.
Date of manufacture of CRAC.
The value of this property shall represent the actual date of manufacture of CRAC.
The actual Manufacturer of CRAC.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Manufacturer of CRAC.
The actual Model Number of CRAC.
The value of this property shall represent the actual Model Number of CRAC.

The value of this property shall represent the actual Serial Number of CRAC.

The value of this property shall represent the actual Part Number of CRAC.

The value of this property shall represent the actual Asset Tag of CRAC.

The value of this property shall represent the actual Physical Location of CRAC.

The value of this property shall represent the actual Start Count of CRAC.

This property shall indicate the actual Unit Paused boolean value of CRAC.
The actual Control Type of CRAC.
This property shall indicate the actual Control Type (P, PI, PID or Custom) of CRAC.
